qas.question: What school did Massey University combine with?
In what decade did New Zealand's tertiary education institutions begin consolidation?
What school considered a merger with Waikato Institute of Technology that was later abandoned?
What island was Waiarapa Polytechnic located on before it merged with UCOL?

context: Since the <a1_0>1990s<a1_0/>, there has been consolidation in New Zealand's state-owned tertiary education system. In the polytechnic sector: <a0_0>Wellington Polytechnic<a0_0/> amalgamated with Massey University. The <a2_0>Central Institute of Technology<a2_0/> explored a merger with the Waikato Institute of Technology, which was abandoned, but later, after financial concerns, controversially amalgamated with Hutt Valley Polytechnic, which in turn became Wellington Institute of Technology. Some smaller polytechnics in the <a3_0>North Island<a3_0/>, such as Waiarapa Polytechnic, amalgamated with UCOL. (The only other amalgamations have been in the colleges of education.)
